alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Bremer; Grundy (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Black Hawk, southeastern Bremer and northeastern Grundy Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hudson, or near Cedar Falls, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cedar Falls and Waterloo Municipal Airport around 305 PM CDT. Waterloo, Evansdale and Crossroads Mall around 310 PM CDT. Elk Run Heights around 315 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 63 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
